meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by gynogenesis.
meanings.sent1: The gynogenetic process is fascinating to study in biology class.
meanings.sent2: Her gynogenetic traits were inherited from her mother.
meanings.sent3: The gynogenetic experiment resulted in unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent4: The gynogenetic nature of the plant made it unique among its species.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained the gynogenetic characteristics of the new species.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to reproduction involving only female gametes.
meanings.sent1: The gynogenetic reproduction method is common in certain species.
meanings.sent2: The fish exhibited gynogenetic behavior during the breeding season.
meanings.sent3: The gynogenetic approach to reproduction surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her gynogenetic traits were evident in her offspring.
meanings.sent5: The gynogenetic process ensured genetic diversity in the population.

meanings.definition: A type of reproduction in which offspring are produced from the female gamete without fertilization by a male gamete.
meanings.sent1: The gynogenetic method allows for reproduction without male involvement.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the gynogenetic process in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The gynogenetic offspring inherited traits only from the mother.
meanings.sent4: The gynogenetic cycle continued uninterrupted in the controlled environment.
meanings.sent5: The gynogenetic offspring displayed unique genetic patterns.
